snippet: Three Islamic extremist factions in Mali announced that they have merged into one group and pledged allegiance to al-Qaida's leader, according to a group that monitors jihadist websites....

headline.main: UK Banks Need to Build Operations in EU Post-Brexit-ECB
headline.print_headline: UK Banks Need to Build Operations in EU Post-Brexit-ECB

lead_paragraph: Three Islamic extremist factions in Mali announced that they have merged into one group and pledged allegiance to al-Qaida's leader, according to a group that monitors jihadist websites.
